long_description: The convenient GoPro Wi-Fi remote lets you easily and wirelessly control your Wi-Fi enabled GoPro camera. Enjoy full camera control including power on/off, settings, shutter and start/stop recording. Remote controls up to 50 cameras at a time from up to 600 ft. in optimal conditions. LCD screen mirrors your camera's LCD status screen. Comes with an attachment strap, key ring and charging cable. The GoPro Wi-Fi remote is wearable and waterproof to 10 ft.
short_description: The convenient GoPro Wi-Fi remote lets you easily and wirelessly control your Wi-Fi enabled GoPro camera. Enjoy full camera control including power on/off, settings, shutter and start/stop recording.
